product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Risotto with Chicken - 2 Servings
long_description: Backpacker's Pantry Risotto with Chicken features a delicious combination of rice, vegetables, Parmesan cheese and chicken. Easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for 13 min., and serve. Provides two 14 oz. servings. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents.
short_description: Backpacker's Pantry Risotto with Chicken features a delicious combination of rice, vegetables, Parmesan cheese and chicken.
